name: XP Framework
body: ### About The XP framework offers consistent, multi-purpose, object oriented, production-tested collection of classes, APIs for app server connectivity, web services, dynamic web sites, date access and manipulation, logging, collections, I/O, databases, O/R mapping, XML, unittesting, and much more. ### Example: Age in days ```php getDays(), ' days old'); } } ?> ``` Now, run it: ``` $ xp AgeInDays 1980-05-28 Hey, you are 11699 days old ``` ### Install a release Download a release from our [Releases site](http://releases.xp-framework.net/). ### Roadmap Learn about what is planned and what features older releases contained: * [Planned / future releases roadmap](https://github.com/xp-framework/xp-framework/issues/milestones?state=open) * [Existing releases roadmap](https://github.com/xp-framework/xp-framework/issues/milestones?state=closed) ### Explore To learn more about the XP Framework, here are some resources to read about it: * [Quickstart Guide](https://github.com/xp-framework/xp-framework/wiki/setup.framework) * [Our mailing lists](https://github.com/xp-framework/xp-framework/wiki/mailinglists) * [Checkout instructions](https://github.com/xp-framework/xp-framework/wiki/setup.checkout)
tagline: The XP Framework is an all-purpose, object-oriented PHP framework.
